mapper.insert: insert into recipe(cate, cnum, main_name, title, mate, pro) values (#{cate}, #{cnum}, #{main_name}, #{title}, #{mate}, #{pro})
insert into recipe_pro(cnum, img1, img2) values (#{cnum}, #{img1}, #{img2})
mapper.select: select count(*) from recipe
select * from recipe where rownum <=9 order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM
select * from (select * from recipe where cate=#{cate} order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) where rownum <=5 and not cnum like #{cnum}
select * from recipe where cnum=#{cnum}
select * from recipe_pro
select count(*) from recipe where cate = #{cate}
select * from recipe_pro where cnum = #{cnum}
select greatest (rice, soup, jeongol, side, shake, gui, jjim, guest, children, kimchi, dosi, fry, noodle, salad, spa, snack, toast, baking, dessert, juice, cocktail, holiday) from mem where id=#{id}

WITH t AS (SELECT rice, soup, jeongol, side, shake, gui, jjim, guest, children, kimchi, dosi, fry, noodle, salad, spa, snack, toast, baking, dessert, juice, cocktail, holiday FROM mem) SELECT * FROM t UNPIVOT (yn FOR cnm IN (rice, soup, jeongol, side, shake, gui, jjim, guest, children, kimchi, dosi, fry, noodle, salad, spa, snack, toast, baking, dessert, juice, cocktail, holiday)) WHERE yn = #{value}
select count(*) from recipe re, recipe_jjim j where re.cnum=j.cnum and id=#{id}
select count(*) from recipe_jjim where id=#{id} and cnum=#{cnum}
select count(*) + 1000 from recipe
mapper.delete: delete from recipe_jjim where id=#{id} and cnum=#{cnum}
mapper.select: select cate,cnum,main_name,title,mate,pro,r from (select cate,cnum,main_name,title,mate,pro,rownum r from (select cate,re.cnum,main_name,title,mate,pro from recipe re, recipe_jjim j where re.cnum=j.cnum and j.id=#{id})) where r>=#{startRow} and r<=#{endRow}
select count(*) from recipe where title like '%'||#{value}||'%'
select * from recipe where title like '%'||#{value}||'%'
select count(*) from recipe where mate like '%'||#{value}||'%'
select * from recipe where mate like '%'||#{value}||'%'
select main_name from( select main_name from recipe where cate=#{value} order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) where rownum <= 1
